snippet: GREENBERG--Dr. Herb, of Princeton, NJ, passed away after a courageous fight against cancer on Tuesday, January 19, 2016, at home surrounded by his loving family. Herb was the founder and CEO of Caliper Corporation. A lifelong Democrat and supporter of progressive causes, Herb fought for equal rights for minorities, women, and returning veterans, as well as abused animals. Herb lost his eyesight at the age of 10. He held multiple degrees from CCNY and a Ph.D. from NYU. Son of the late Harry and Helen Greenberg, Herb is survived by his two sisters, five children; Gary, Mark, Holly, Alex, and Sally; and one grandchild, Sarah. Donations can be made to Learning Ally, Helen Keller International, or SAVE, A Friend to Homeless Animals. 1/3
